data.oai_dc:dc: Rare earth elements measured on water bottle samples at BATS

BATS15m, Cerium, dissolved, CTD/Rosette, CTD-RO, DEPTH, water, Dysprosium, dissolved, Erbium, dissolved, Europium, dissolved, Gadolinium, dissolved, GEOTRACES, Global marine biogeochemical cycles of trace elements and their isotopes, Holmium, dissolved, Lanthanum, dissolved, Lutetium, dissolved, Neodymium, dissolved, North Atlantic Ocean, Praseodymium, dissolved, Samarium, dissolved, Terbium, dissolved, Thulium, dissolved, Ytterbium, dissolved, Yttrium, dissolved
